channel.title: Adding a new kind of magicks
channel.description:
So... does anyone know how because i know there's ancients there's regular there's lunar anyone know how to add a custom kind? In other words making a new spellbook.
EDIT: Source is Delta

item.title: Adding a new kind of magicks

item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

oh well i want to add some really cool spells got sprites and everything names descriptions but not sure how to add blank spell book interface

item.source: Adding a new kind of magicks

item.title: Adding a new kind of magicks
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

50percentelf:

It is fairly easy to make the additional interface. What you do is you go into your client into rsinterface.java there will be a section in there on lunar and ancient magic. So you look at that and make a new interface using those code bases with a new id. Then you go into your source client.java and find the place where it says what magic book equals what interface. You create a new book number, probably 3 since 0= modern 1 = ancient 2= lunar. then you add the ability to switch into the book via altar or npc.

hmm… what if i’m using delta? i dnt think i have rsinterface.java

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a new kind of magicks

item.title: Adding a new kind of magicks
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

It is fairly easy to make the additional interface. What you do is you go into your client into rsinterface.java there will be a section in there on lunar and ancient magic. So you look at that and make a new interface using those code bases with a new id. Then you go into your source client.java and find the place where it says what magic book equals what interface. You create a new book number, probably 3 since 0= modern 1 = ancient 2= lunar. then you add the ability to switch into the book via altar or npc.

Read full topic

lol yeah i just got through reading it anyways think you could share how to make a seperate interface so that sprites could be added and i read your post with my little knowledge you have to do something in clickingmost or actionbuttons for you since its pi
